pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a scenic, wide-angle shot from the bow of a large container ship at sea. The camera looks out over stacks of shipping containers towards a dramatic, colorful sky at either sunrise or sunset. The vast ocean stretches to the horizon under a cloudy, pastel-colored sky.
